new_greeting: Hi {{ UserName }}, Welcome to Operation Code! I'm a bot designed to help answer questions and get you on your way in our community.

Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct: https://op.co.de/code-of-conduct Our goal here at Operation Code is to get veterans and their families started on the path to a career in programming. We do that through providing you with scholarships, mentoring, career development opportunities, conference tickets, and more!
You're currently in Slack, a chat application that serves as the hub of Operation Code.
If you're currently visiting us via your browser, Slack provides a stand alone program to make staying in touch even more convenient. You can download it here: https://slack.com/downloads
Below you'll see a list of topics. You can click on each topic to get more info. If you want to see the topics again just reply to me with any message.
Want to make your first change to a program right now? Click on the 'OpCode Challenge' button to get instructions on how to make a change to this very bot!
